name: scp-terminal
description: an scp terminal made in electron
author: mellobacon <>

scripts.start: tsc && copyfiles -f src/pages/*.html dist/pages && copyfiles -f src/components/styles/*.css dist/components/styles/ && electron .
scripts.build: tsc && copyfiles -f src/pages/*.html dist/pages && copyfiles -f src/components/styles/*.css dist/components/styles/ && copyfiles -f src/components/images/*.png dist/components/images && copyfiles -f icon.ico dist/
